topics.body:
>at grocery store
>buying federally mandated ration of cottage cheese, tofu and other non-oppressive sources of nutrition
>wait in the progressive stack
>women and minorities finally finished
>patriarchies turn to pay for their groceries.
>Trans-gendered checker beeps my estrogen patches
>S/he beeps my federally mandated butt-plugs
>“only on size 5 i see”
>purses his/her lips in disapproval
>hope s/he doesn’t realize what my razor blades mean
>start sweating
>beep
>“razor blades, hummm?” s/he intones nasally
>th-th-ey’re for my girlfriend i stammer quickly
> s/he peers closely at my face
>“THIS MALE HAS FACIAL HAIR” s/he screams
>she slaps the privilege button
>privilege siren starts blaring
>a cage descends from the ceiling
>the privileged Cadillac bursts through the store’s front windows
>5 negros surround me
>I stammer that I ran out of estrogen
>look into his flat black eyes
>realize he can’t understand English.
>try to speak it in Ebonics
>he snaps SHUDUFUGUP RACISS HONKEY BITCH
>They tear off my pants
> WE CHECK PRIVILEGE NOW
>a shock prod is inserted into my anus as another black checks my glans
>DIS RACISS GOT HE FORESKIN
>gasps all around
>the cashier sprays me with pepper spray
>everyone starts beating the shit out of me
>get sent to forcible gender reassignment
>privilege checked.

topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547301656368724c06e00200#post_547301656368724c06e00200
Little to none have cared for such.

Oh, my exams are over so I can finally declare myself a graduate of high school! Those 5 months have been the most gruesome ones yet but I'm confident to say that I might get good grades and probably go to college overseas. I need to get straight As if I want to get a scholarship and go to prestigious universities in Japan. I was thinking either Ritsumeikan or Yokohama. I also plan to learn Japanese at a nearby university before I go there.

Currently, I'm thinking of my future plans. I'm interested in either aerospace engineering, telecommunications or petroleum engineering. I might choose Digital Animation with Game Development if I decided not to choose the other three.

So, what do you guys think? (Currently, I have no skills in any of those)
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547310646368723b17260000#post_547310646368723b17260000
In all honesty, I would take some kind of aptitude test or test designed to show what you're good at and then decide based on those results. 

I would also look at a book called Worthless about the pitfalls and problems with college, notably worthless majors. Which none of those are but still it is a good resource
